translations: 优于；胜过（outdo 的过去式）

sentences.sentence: Will outdid all of his classmates in Math.
sentences.translation: 威尔的数学比他班上的同学都还强。

sentences.sentence: Think back to the last time that you beat a friend at a card game or outdid your previous record in a 5k race.
sentences.translation: 想一想上次你在和朋友玩纸牌时获胜了，或是刷新了5公里赛跑的记录。
